item.description:
@loganccrone wrote:

Hey my runserver code is

@echo off
cls
echo Voule Auto restart
tskill java /a
echo Restarting server
title Allstar-Scape v1
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
cls

I was wondering if i have to download Java 3.0? or what one shud i download?
